epics.Description: Harden identity, marketplace, run verification, settlement, analytics, and dispute flows into a production release candidate.
Move from stub rails to real provider adapters with deterministic reconciliation, mismatch handling, and finance operations tooling.
Ship high-frequency escrow and deterministic netting windows for microtransactions with replay-safe ledgers.
Add arbiter assignment, verdict artifacts, and appeal lifecycles with strict evidence linkage.
Deliver versioned policy rollout UX and delegation/org-auth controls including key rotation and revocation paths.
Launch verifier plugin registry/sandbox and selective-disclosure artifacts for privacy-aware verification.
Reach release SLOs, improve incident readiness, and validate throughput targets for autonomous transaction workloads.
Ship first-class SDK flows, examples, onboarding docs, and integration templates to become the default developer standard.
Implement SaaS metering, pricing plans, invoicing, and usage controls that convert adoption into recurring revenue.
Run targeted pilots, convert design partners, and establish repeatable demand generation for release expansion.
Convert the platform from release-ready components into a live autonomous transaction network with production rails, policy-safe governance, and lighthouse customer throughput.

tickets.Description: Lock and version public API surfaces for identity, tasks, bids, runs, settlement, disputes, analytics, and webhooks.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: OpenAPI and SDK contracts are version-tagged and diff checks fail on breaking changes

tickets.Description: Enforce idempotent semantics for run event settlement resolution, policy replay, and dispute transitions.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Duplicate request suites pass with stable responses and no ledger drift

tickets.Description: Promote trust/reputation aggregates to release-grade API with pagination, filters, and stable fields.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Trust graph endpoints return deterministic sorted payloads under pagination

tickets.Description: Add stronger dispute evidence validation and timeline correlation for ops and auditors.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Dispute evidence APIs enforce schema and hash-binding checks with test coverage

tickets.Summary: Run R1 regression and determinism matrix
tickets.Description: Execute and gate release on deterministic replay matrix across API, bundles, verify CLI, and fixture corpus.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Release candidate passes deterministic matrix twice with byte-stable outputs

tickets.Description: Generalize money-rail adapters for provider webhooks, retries, and lifecycle transition hooks.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Adapter contract supports create/status/cancel and transition callbacks with fixture tests

tickets.Description: Add one real payout provider integration in sandbox mode with deterministic state normalization.

tickets.Description: Define and implement alerts for payout failure rate, stale operations, and unresolved mismatch age.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Alerting dashboards and thresholds are live and validated in staging drills

tickets.Description: Define netting window artifact schema, closure semantics, and replay invariants.

tickets.Description: Create stress harness for hold/release/forfeit sequences and verify ledger conservation under load.

tickets.Description: Publish net position and exposure APIs for operators and downstream settlement services.

tickets.Description: Introduce arbiter identities, qualification flags, and deterministic assignment rules.

tickets.Description: Persist signed verdict and appeal artifacts linked to dispute evidence and policy hashes.

tickets.Description: Provide queue, SLA timers, and outcome reporting for arbitration operations.

tickets.Description: Add conformance vectors for invalid transitions, signature failures, and appeal branching.
